metadata.title: US Amb. pays farewell call on DPM/FM Dar

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 07 (APP): Donald Blome, the U.S. Ambassador to Pakistan, on Tuesday made a farewell call on Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar. The DPM/FM congratulated Ambassador Blome on successfully completing his tenure in Pakistan and appreciated his role in strengthening Pakistan-US relations, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release. Dar expressed the government of Pakistan's resolve to continue positive engagement with the new US administration.
